name: Fallen Kingdom
description: Someday any kingdom comes to an end. Most often this is due to wars, but what if it happens because of magic?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Any with 2 cores and 1 or more GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Any with a little value of memory Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Any better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any better Storage: 300 MB available space
